Quest.QuestDescription: A prisoner has escaped and needs to be tried for his crimes, bring him back to the castle

Task.TaskText: The baliff can be found just beyond the bridge.

Conversation.Dialogue: {CHARACTER_NAME}: I hear we have a criminal on the loose
Baliff: Yes he has fled the castle just as he was about to stand trial, can you help?
{CHARACTER_NAME}: Did you see which way he went?
Baliff: I did not. Try asking the guards at the mud passageway. They'll tell you whether he has made his way to the wasteland. If not you know he is somewhere in the grassland.

Task.TaskTitle: Talk to one of the guards at the mud passageway

Conversation.Dialogue: {CHARACTER_NAME}: Hello, did a prisoner go past this way?
Guard: We haven't seen anyone pass through here in days. No one dares venture into the wasteland.
{CHARACTER_NAME}: That must mean that the prisoner is still in the grasslands.

Task.TaskTitle: Find the prisoner somewhere in the grasslands

Conversation.Dialogue: {CHARACTER_NAME}: Oi, I have got you, come with me
Prisoner: Oh no, have you been sent by the courts?
{CHARACTER_NAME}: The baliff has sent me to arrest you and bring you back to be tried for your crimes
Prisoner: I only fled as the gate were left open
{CHARACTER_NAME}: If you come with me now, you will not receive extra punishment for fleeing
Prisoner: OK, I am a bit lost though

Task.TaskTitle: Lead the prisoner back to the castle and talk to the baliff

Conversation.Dialogue: Baliff: You have got him, well done.
{CHARACTER_NAME}: No problem, he cooperated in his return.
Baliff: You're coming with me scumbag!
